description_presentation: I'm a Full Stack web developer and a Computer Science student passionate about building seamless user experiences
projects_callout: You can check some of my personal projects below
pomodoro_description: Pomodoro Timer integrated with a task management system. Each task's state persistently stored in the browser's localStorage.
map_points_description: Map marker CRUD inside a farm harvest delimitated area using the Google Maps API
todo_api_description: Todo-list API with user tasks and also shared workspaces between users
about_me_left_text: Hello! I am a Computer Science student at Universidade Federal de Pelotas and have been working as a Full Stack Developer for over a year. Currently, I mainly work with React on the front-end and Ruby on Rails on the back-end, which are the technologies I specialize in. However, I have experience with other technologies such as Typescript, Tailwind, NodeJS, and Java Spring Boot.
about_me_right_text: My journey in web development started with basic HTML and CSS, and it quickly evolved into a love for JavaScript and full-stack technologies. I've been honing my skills in both front-end and back-end development, with a particular interest in modern frameworks like React for the front-end and Ruby on Rails for the back-end. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and keeping up with the latest trends in the tech world. My goal is to continually grow as a developer and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.
fullstack_dev_description: Fullstack developer at Checkplant, working mostly with React and Ruby on Rails. Responsible for implementing new features and also helping with bugs
internship_dev_description: Training program on Full Stack development and practices related to development.
contact_description: If you wish to get in touch, feel free to reach out to me on my social media.
